name: Oddjobs Inc.
description:
You play as Justin Case, a man who does all sorts of odd jobs for his clients and has an affinity for trouble. Unfortunately, you're pretty broke right now and your girlfriend will surely leave you if you do nothing about it. Let's  hope you have a new case soon!

Controls: Left click for selection. Space to open inventory. Right click to use objects in inventory. Space to place back objects in inventory.
